title: Introduction to Security
content: Security in software protects applications from threats, attacks, and unauthorized access.

title: Authentication & Authorization
content: Authentication verifies identity, while authorization controls access to resources.

title: OWASP Top 10
content: A list of the most critical security risks for web applications.

title: Data Encryption
content: Encryption secures data by transforming it into unreadable text for unauthorized users.
questions: Difference between symmetric and asymmetric encryption?

title: Security Best Practices
content: Implement strong passwords, secure APIs, input validation, and regular vulnerability testing.
